'''''Samotni wobec historii''''' ("Solitary in the face of history") is a Polish-language book, containing 14 articles. One of them deals with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: "Tolkien czyli świat" ("Tolkien, that is, a world").<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam|Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref>
